channel.title: I need to make it snow!
channel.description: Okay well I want to make it so whenever a player logs in its snowing, and they can turn the snow off with a command if they want. Can someone give me the coding for the ::snow, and ::nosnow command? Thanks!

item.title: I need to make it snow!

item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Okay well I want to make it so whenever a player logs in its snowing, and they can turn the snow off with a command if they want. Can someone give me the coding for the ::snow, and ::nosnow command? Thanks!
